member.name: IDWriteGdiInterop1.CreateFontFromLOGFONT
member.summary: Creates a font object that matches the properties specified by the LOGFONT structure.
member.param: Structure containing a GDI-compatible font description.
The font collection to search. If NULL, the local system font collection is used.
Receives a newly created font object if successful, or NULL in case of error.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGdiInterop1.GetFontSignature
member.summary: Reads the font signature from the given font.
member.param: Font to read font signature from.
Font signature from the OS/2 table, ulUnicodeRange, and ulCodePageRange.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGdiInterop1.GetFontSignature
member.summary: Reads the font signature from the given font.
member.param: Font to read font signature from.
Font signature from the OS/2 table, ulUnicodeRange, and ulCodePageRange.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGdiInterop1.GetMatchingFontsByLOGFONT
member.summary: Gets a list of matching fonts based on the specified LOGFONT values. Only fonts of that family name will be returned.
member.param: Structure containing a GDI-compatible font description.
>Receives the filtered font set if successful.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDWriteGdiInterop1
member.summary: Provides interoperability with GDI, such as methods to convert a font face to a LOGFONT structure, or to convert a GDI font description into a font face. It is also used to create bitmap render target objects.
